thread.title: WPP's Commarco takes share of German PR firm
thread.title_full: WPP's Commarco takes share of German PR firm

title: WPP's Commarco takes share of German PR firm
text:
Tip : Use comma (,) to separate multiple quotes. Learn more... 
Tue, Jul 7, 2015, 11:38 BST - UK Markets close in 4 hrs 52 mins WPP's Commarco takes share of German PR firm Sharecast – 5 minutes ago 3,796.00 -54.9998 
LONDON (ShareCast) - Advertising Group WPP has taken a majority interest in Hamburg based Nicole Weber Communications. No purchase price was disclosed for the acquisition, made through WPP (LSE: WPP.L - news ) 's German based marketing network Commarco GmbH. 
WPP said PR firm focused on lifestyle industries, employed 30 people and had gross assets of about €1.1m. 
Its client list included Opel, ASOS (LSE: ASC.L - news ) and Olympus. 
Shares (Berlin: DI6.BE - news ) in WPP fell 0.28% to 1,425p on Tuesday at 09.48 Tax cuts, pensions, childcare, online accounts and beer duty, here's … Related Stock Articles Follow the quotes you care about most.
